column4: i updated my breezy (i think to dapper), and rebooted to complete the install, now all i get when gnome should be loaded is a blank screen, but my laptop is still running, any idea why?
wastrel i ran the recovery and it said something about my x server, but i didn;t know what that meant
i can only access the recovery, so is it possible to fix it this way?
what graphics card do you have?
